document_data.caption: A map showing the Hanging Lantern north of Oar Alley.
document_data.name: Hanging Lantern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hanging Lantern''' was a [[festhall]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood an impressive six storys tall.
document_data.Location: The Hanging Lantern was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] in a small neighborhood bordered by [[Ship Street (Waterdeep)|Ship Street]] to the west, [[Pressbow Lane]] to the east, and [[Oar Alley]] to the south.{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5310}}
document_data.History: [[Volothamp Geddarm]] revealed that the [[prostitute|escorts]] within the Hanging Lantern were actually [[doppleganger]]s working for the [[Unseen]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The owner of the festhall in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, was Lady [[Cyrtue]].
